title: Leaver Buster Glitch?
body: I got leaver buster penalty for 20:00 for the next 5 games because my game crashed, and then my frame rate wouldnt go above 7 fps even after i restarted, so then once it was fixed, i went through the 5 penalty games, and had to get off for the night, and when i logged back on the next day, i had 5 more penalty games, can someone fix this please? spending almost 3 1/2 hours for my game crashing seems odd right? plz help!

replies.body: It looks like you had another leave today that added another set of [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  It's really important to stay consistent otherwise your penalty can continue to escalate.  I'd like to help figure this out and not get anymore leaves, but I need more info.  What do you mean exactly by crash?  Are there error messages?  Let me know.
